column5: Located in the Historic District is one of Fredericksburg Texasâ€™ most beautiful properties, The Bierschwale Estate. Designed by the noted English architect, Alfred Giles, this private home was built in 1889. Nestled on the grounds is this fabulous log cabin with a large living room complete with a huge rock fireplace, bathroom with claw foot tub and shower and a beautiful bedroom with a king size bed. The grounds are beautifully landscaped!! This is the perfect place to escape to.
